description: PM Modi meets scientists from LIGO who proved gravitational waves theory PM Modi meets Indian student scientists at LIGO India extremely important for the future of the LIGO project: LIGO Director Dr. France Cordova PM Modi describes LIGO project as a great example of India-US scientific collaborati…
caption: n-m4.in
message:
Insightful interaction with scientists from LIGO, including 3 young Indian scientists who worked on LIGO project. 

LIGO project is a great example of India-USA ties & will surely inspire several young science enthusiasts in India. http://n-m4.in/1MWlDYe
